title: WHO WILL YOU FIGHT FOR? - War of Rights
description:
After seeing a lot of interest in my Civil War videos, I wanted to bring awareness of a new game that I have been following for awhile.  It is a historical FPS based in the civil war.  You can find out more from the links below.

Their website: https://warofrights.com/

Their Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/WarOfRightsOfficial

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D

----------------------------------How You Can Support Me! ------------------------------------

- Like, share and leave a comment :D
- Turn OFF adblock or whitelist my channel
- Send me a GREAT battle Replay: pixelatedapollo@gmail.com

------------------------------------------Connect With Me!-------------------------------------------

- Email: pixelatedapollo@gmail.com
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/PixelatedApollo
- Steam Group:  http://steamcommunity.com/groups/apollosknights
- Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/pixelatedapollo
- TeamSpeak: thewarcamp.vortexservers.com:10124
